attributes.additional_details:
Sign our petition and show the people of the United Kingdom that we are in fact united.

Some companies and places In London sport spikes in places where people less fortunate would lay their head to sleep.  It is bad enough that with all of the empty housing in the UK we still have homeless people.  To make this worse we as a population just want to "Shoo" humans onwards is worse.

Don't ignore people... Help them.

Sign this e-petition to show your support for your fellow person.
